mlcomm
  • Welcome to the documentation for mlcomm!
  • View page source

Welcome to the documentation for mlcomm!ÔÉÅ

The next-generation telecommunications in Beyond 5G, 6G, and Internet of Things (IoT) concepts require reliabilty and low-latency to fuel the increasing requirement for fast and available data. Leveraging practices in Machine Learning to enhance and modify existing features in the current standards enable these future capabilities.

Check out the Installation section for further information, including how to install the project.
